reviewText: I didn't realize it was in only German and the packaging is slightly worn.
Love the Movie but the DVD had problems at the beginning. Was not recorded right had the picture break down and squares show up at beginning of movie. Once past that it was ok. Great movie otherwise.
I liked the actress who played Azumi and the action story that went with this episode......as ridiculously as it may seem for a woman to be this good a swordsman!
Take note that the DVDs I got say "New English Language Version" and Japanese is not one of the listed languages.

These are my favorite movies of all time. I have even bought the posters a sword replica and photo books and costume from the movies for a full movie display in my room. Ueto Aya is stunningly beautiful in this and a great lead for both the movies. If you love samurai or ninja movies or just Ueto Aya this is a must see.
Excellent action. A must see in my opinion. Lead character is amazingly beautiful as the heroine, and deadly with the sword. I was very glad to add this to my collection.
